## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                          | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `required` | `required` | Set to `true` to prevent deselecting once a selection has been made. | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `value`    | `value`    |                                                                      | `any`     | `undefined` |

| Event     | Description                             | Type               |
| --------- | --------------------------------------- | ------------------ |
